column5: Well it has been some crappy days sense my ATV went missing, but today I thought I would welcome spring with some river fishing most of the places I post about for crappie around simcoe are open/ somewhat open or will be later this week I have not picked up my big boat yet so I put the folding boat on the back of the truck and off I go.. lots of ice flowing down the river and junk, tons of junk floating by I tried under the bridge but not much luck then by the fallen trees and picked up a few then I fished the edge of the remaining ice and there were lots there... so I played for a couple of hours and came home.. but I was on the water..yippy..
Way to go Terry. Must be nice just to get out on the water.
Great stuff Terry... good to see you out in the foldin piece of plastic !

Ever since your post about your ATV...it's like a hunting mission.  I still have my eyes open for ya.  Saw one the other day but it was red.  Glad to see that you got today, and got yourself a phish.  Lots of junk floating in the Castor River too...and the river is flowing fast.
Great you got out today  Terry...Was hoping you would have had some news about your ATV  by now...  Will keep the eyes open for you....

Glad to see somebody catchin' Crappie!!!  I haven't hurt them any since the boat went into the shop, but that should change this week. The good thing about it is they should've forgotten all about what a Sabiki Rigs is!
What time were you there from terry? i was there with my girlfriend and my dog from 11:00am untill 1pm.
Sorry to hear about the atv Terry, however it looks like you managed a wonderful day on the water... Thanks for the post, loved the pictures...  Cheers,  Jen
i think i can see us in the background! lol
lovetofish, I was fishing right beside you for a while
Can't beat a Crappie day, especially when phish are involved. WTG Terry!
Looks like a great day out there for you Terry.  You're very close to my sister's place there.  Joey
Nice stuff Terry, was on that shoreline myself today for a while (one of the many poor shmucks without a boat)
WTG Terry nice to see more open water reports nice little fishies.  Hope they catch the dude who stole your Quad.
nice job , bud...thanks for the report !! Sorry again to hear about the theft
